title: (x) Upright script w/ curly swashes - Fling {Marcelo}
content:
Are these the same font and what are they?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [medicine026.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080704150214/http:/typophile.com/files/medicine026.jpg) | 1.94 KB |
| [warming030.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080704150214/http:/typophile.com/files/warming030.jpg) | 13.37 KB |

 [‹ (x) Script on Aimee Mann "Bachelor No. 2" album cover - Artscript No.1 {Arun}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080704150214/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39902 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) "Modern The World" Art Nouveau-ish serf face - hand drawn {Stephen} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080704150214/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39895 "Go to next forum topic")
author: 18karis

comments.content:
If you posted an image, make sure it’s in RGB not CMYK.

- Lex

yep, both samples are the same. It’s [Fling with alternates](http://web.archive.org/web/20080704150214/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/creative_alliance/fling/?sample_text=Warming%20medicine&sample_size=36)
